data.chText: 目标；指标
data.enText: a result that you try to achieve

data.chText: 经营目的和指标
data.enText: business goals and targets

data.chText: 成绩目标
data.enText: attainment targets

data.chText: 给自己制订有望达到的指标。
data.enText: Set yourself targets that you can reasonably hope to achieve.

data.chText: 完成 / 达到目标
data.enText: to meet/achieve a target

data.chText: 2006年4月这一预定日期
data.enText: a target date of April 2006

data.chText: 这所大学将于下个九月达到在校学生5 000人的目标。
data.enText: The university will reach its target of 5 000 students next September.

data.chText: 新建的体育中心将在六月份如期开放。
data.enText: The new sports complex is on target to open in June.

data.chText: 目标范围／观众／群体
data.enText: a target area/audience/group (= the particular area, audience, etc. that a product, programme, etc. is aimed at)

data.chText: （攻击的）目标，对象
data.enText: an object, a person or a place that people aim at when attacking

data.chText: 他们轰炸了军事和民用目标。
data.enText: They bombed military and civilian targets.

data.chText: 门窗被窃贼作为入室的目标容易得手。
data.enText: Doors and windows are an easy target for burglars.

data.chText: 这是恐怖分子攻击的首要目标。
data.enText: It's a prime target (= an obvious target) for terrorist attacks.

data.chText: 他最近成了众矢之的。
data.enText: He's become the target for a lot of criticism recently.

data.chText: 靶；靶子
data.enText: an object that people practise shooting at, especially a round board with circles on it

data.chText: 瞄准靶子
data.enText: to aim at a target

data.chText: 中 / 脱靶
data.enText: to hit/miss the target

data.chText: 射击练习
data.enText: target practice
targeting
targeted
targeted

data.chText: 把…作为攻击目标；把…作为批评的对象
data.enText: to aim an attack or a criticism at sb/sth

data.chText: 导弹主要瞄准的是美国。
data.enText: The missiles were mainly targeted at the United States.

data.chText: 这家公司因用狗做药物试验而成为动物保护团体批评的对象。
data.enText: The company has been targeted by animal rights groups for its use of dogs in drugs trials.

data.chText: 面向，把…对准（某群体）
data.enText: to try to have an effect on a particular group of people

data.chText: 这个宣传计划显然是针对青年人的。
data.enText: The campaign is clearly targeted at the young.

data.chText: 以单身汉为读者群的新杂志
data.enText: a new magazine that targets single men

data.chText: 以上各词均指目标、目的。
data.enText: These are all words for sth that you are trying to achieve.
target

data.chText: 指试图达到的目标、指标：
data.enText: a result that you try to achieve

data.chText: 给自己制订有望达到的指标。
data.enText: Set yourself targets that you can reasonably hope to achieve.

data.chText: 学校的成绩目标
data.enText: attainment targets in schools
objective

data.chText: 指正努力达到的目标、目的：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) something that you are trying to achieve

data.chText: 这个项目的主要目标是什么？
data.enText: What is the main objective of this project?
goal

data.chText: 指希望达到的目标、目的：
data.enText: something that you hope to achieve

data.chText: 他继续追求他成为演员的目标。
data.enText: He continued to pursue his goal of becoming an actor.

data.chText: 用targett﹑objective还是goal？
target通常为以某种方式正式记录的指标，如由雇主或政府委员会等制订，常为具体的数字，如销售量、考试及格率、日期等；objective通常指为自己制订的、希望达到的目标，常为某一项目或发言的一部分；goal通常指长远目标，与人生和职业规划、公司或机构的长远规划有关。
data.enText: A target is usually officially recorded in some way, for example by an employer or by a government committee. It is often specific, and in the form of figures, such as number of sales or examination passes, or a date. People often set their own objectives : these are things that they wish to achieve, often as part of a project or a talk they are giving. Goals are often long-term, and relate to people's life and career plans or the long-term plans of a company or organization.
target, objective or goal?
object

data.chText: 指目的、目标、宗旨：
data.enText: the purpose of sth; sth that you plan to achieve

data.chText: 目的就是教育大众注意交通安全。
data.enText: The object is to educate people about road safety.
end

data.chText: 指计划达到的目的、目标：
data.enText: something that you plan to achieve

data.chText: 他为了政治目的加入了这个协会。
data.enText: He joined the society for political ends.

data.chText: 除非你认为只要目的正确可以不择手段，不然那是不可以接受的。
data.enText: That's only OK if you believe that the end justifies the means (= bad methods of doing sth are acceptable if the final result is good) .

data.chText: end通常以复数形式或在某些固定短语中出现。
data.enText: End usually occurs in the plural or in particular fixed expressions.
to work towards a(n) target/objective/goal
a(n) impossible/ambitious/difficult/tough/unrealistic target/objective/goal
economic/financial/business/sales targets/objectives/goals
to set/reach/succeed in/meet/exceed/fall short of/agree/identify a(n) target/objective/goal
to achieve a(n) target/objective/goal/end
attainment/recruitment targets

ex.chText: 他来纽约是为了做生意。
ex.enText: He came to New York with the purpose of doing business.

ex.chText: 这次会议的目的是讨论如何应对此次危机。
ex.enText: The purpose of this meeting is to discuss how to deal with the crisis.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指经过考虑而要做某事的意图，通常用单数。

ex.chText: 这一课程的主要目标是提高口语。
ex.enText: The main aim of this course is to improve your oral English.

ex.chText: 旨在帮助罪案受害者的运动已经在全球范围内得到了关注。
ex.enText: The campaign with the aim of helping the victims of crime has received worldwide attention.

synonyms.bx: 强调希望做成某事的具体意图，多指短期目标。

ex.chText: 他们实现扩大公司市场份额的目标了吗？
ex.enText: Did they reach their goal of expanding the company's market share?

synonyms.bx: 多指想要通过一段时间的努力而在未来实现某事的意图。

ex.chText: 家长们首先想知道这项游戏的目的是什么。
ex.enText: The parents first wanted to know what the object of this game was.

ex.chText: 低收入人群将获益最大，这正是此举的目的。
ex.enText: People with low income will benefit the most, and that is the object of this exercise.

synonyms.bx: 指某一计划、行为或活动的目的，通常用单数。

ex.chText: 你应该在下学期开始的时候制定一个目标。
ex.enText: You should set an objective at the beginning of next semester.

ex.chText: 他在总统任期结束之前必须实现某些目标。
ex.enText: He has to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.

synonyms.bx: 尤用于商业或政治方面，侧重指人所想要实现的目标。

ex.chText: 新大楼完工的预定日期是什么时候？
ex.enText: What is the target date for completion of the new building?

synonyms.bx: 多用于数量、时间、财务等方面，表示想要达到的具体目标。

tr: sports equipment consisting of an object set up for a marksman or archer to aim at
the goal intended to be attained (and which is believed to be attainable)
example: the sole object of her trip was to see her children

tr: a reference point to shoot at
the location of the target that is to be hit
a person who is the aim of an attack (especially a victim of ridicule or exploitation) by some hostile person or influence
intend (something) to move towards a certain goal
example: He aimed his fists towards his opponent's face
direct your anger towards others, not towards yourself

value.def: A target is something at which someone is aiming a weapon or other object.

example.ex: The village lies beside a main road, making it an easy target for bandits...
example.tran: 村子坐落在大路边上，很容易成为土匪袭击的对象。

example.ex: He missed the target only once yesterday...

value.def: A target is a result that you are trying to achieve.

example.ex: He's won back his place too late to achieve his target of 20 goals this season.
example.tran: 他赢回自己的位置时为时已晚，无法实现本赛季进 20 粒球的目标。

example.ex: ...school leavers who failed to reach their target grades.
example.tran: 未能达到规定分数的肄业生

value.def: To target a particular person or thing means to decide to attack or criticize them.

example.ex: Republicans targeted Unsoeld as vulnerable in her bid for reelection this year...
example.tran: 共和党人将安索尔德定为攻击目标，认为她在争取今年连任的竞选中不堪一击。

example.ex: He targets the economy as the root cause of the deteriorating law and order situation.
example.tran: 他抨击经济是治安状况不断恶化的根源。

example.ex: In the past they have been the target of racist abuse...
example.tran: 过去，他们一直是种族虐待的对象。

example.ex: The professor has been a frequent target for animal rights extremists.
example.tran: 那位教授屡屡受到极端动物保护主义者的抨击。

value.tran: 攻击;批评;以…为攻击目标

value.def: If you target a particular group of people, you try to appeal to those people or affect them.

example.ex: The campaign will target American insurance companies...
example.tran: 这场活动将以美国各保险公司为目标。

example.ex: The company has targeted adults as its primary customers.
example.tran: 这家公司将成年人作为其主要顾客。

example.ex: Yuppies are a prime target group for marketing strategies.
example.tran: 雅皮士是市场营销策略面向的主要目标群体。

value.def: If someone or something is on target, they are making good progress and are likely to achieve the result that is wanted.

example.ex: We were still right on target for our deadline.
example.tran: 我们仍然有可能赶在最后期限前达成目标。

value.tran: 进展顺利;有可能实现目标

trans: 目标区间；汇率目标区；目标区域；目标汇率范围；目标区
目标定位；目标位置；目标地点
目标明确
目标群体
命中；中的；达到预定指标，完成计划
素质目标；质量目标；目标质量；质量指标；品质目标
目标值；目标价值；靶值；修复目标值；评价样本靶值
目标价位；目标价格；目标价；指标价格；一个目标价格
目标成本；目標成本；即得目标成本；目标成本法；目标利润即得目标成本
目标客户；目标顾客；目标顾客群；目标客群
目标区域；目标面光源；目标区域响应；目标区；目标区响应
目标观众；目标受众
战略目标
移动的目标
销售目标
目标检测；目标探测；目标搜寻
目标系统；目标系统类型；目标机；目标体系；目标群
(翻译的)译文语言，译入语；(外语学习的)目标语言，对象语言，所学语
目标市场
进展顺利;有可能实现目标
